name: b-it-lab-sensors-project
description: Dashboard for a variety of Tinkerforge sensors, as well as other mobile devices

scripts.preinstall: cd _sensors-project/generic-sensor-api && npm install && cd ../phone-sensor && npm install && cd ../dummy-sensor && npm install && cd ../tf-sensor && npm install && npm install && cd ../generic-sensor-api/ && cd ../sensor-server && npm install
scripts.postinstall: npm link ./_sensors-project/sensor-server/ && npm link ./_sensors-project/phone-sensor/ && npm link ./_sensors-project/tf-sensor/
scripts.test-coverage: cd ./_sensors-project/sensor-server/ && nyc --reporter=lcov --report-dir=../../coverage npm run test; nyc report
